description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in ownCloud before 4.0.15, 4.5.x before 4.5.11, and 5.0.x before 5.0.6 allow remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the url parameter to (1) apps/bookmarks/ajax/addBookmark.php or (2) apps/bookmarks/ajax/editBookmark.php.
